content: Virtual Study Group

A platform that creates virtual study groups for online students. Students can join a group based on their interests and courses, and they can interact with each other and discuss course topics. The platform also provides a video conferencing tool for group meetings.
Group creation and management Video conferencing tool Discussion forum Course integration AI-powered matching algorithm
Piazza, Slack, Google Classroom, Zoom, Schoology
AI-powered matching algorithm for personalized group formation
Personalized Tutoring

A service that offers personalized tutoring to online students. Students can choose a tutor based on their learning style and preferences, and they can schedule one-on-one sessions to get personalized help with course material. Tutors are subject matter experts with teaching experience.
Tutor matching based on learning style One-on-one tutoring sessions Flexible scheduling Progress tracking Course integration
Chegg, TutorMe, Khan Academy, Varsity Tutors, Wyzant
Tutor matching based on learning style for personalized learning experience
Online Study Buddy

An app that connects online students with a study buddy who has similar interests and schedules. Students can chat with each other, set study goals, and hold each other accountable. The app also offers a Pomodoro timer to help students stay focused.
Study buddy matching Chat tool Goal-setting feature Pomodoro timer Course integration
StudyBlue, Quizlet, GoConqr, My Study Life, Evernote
Focus on study buddy matching for social learning experience
Online Discussion Platform

A discussion platform that allows online students to participate in course discussions and ask questions. The platform offers a gamified system to encourage participation and rewards for helpful contributions. Students can also rate the usefulness of the discussions and earn points for high ratings.
Course discussion forum Gamified participation system Points and rewards program Rating system for discussions Course integration
Edmodo, Moodle, Blackboard, Canvas, Schoology
Gamified participation system for increased engagement
pain_point_description: many students who take online courses complain about the lack of interaction with teachers and fellow students. they feel isolated and disconnected, which may affect their motivation and learning outcomes
